ability.Gale Wings: If this Pokemon is at full HP, its Flying-type moves have their priority increased by 1.

Brave Bird.effect: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target.

Flamethrower.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

Roost.effect: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP.
